title: Vigil Guard Enterprise Configuration
description: Chrome Managed Storage schema for enterprise deployment of Vigil Guard browser extension. Administrators can pre-configure bootstrap tokens and settings via Chrome policy.

bootstrapToken.title: Bootstrap Token
bootstrapToken.description: One-time token for automatic webhook credential retrieval. Generate this in Vigil Guard Admin Panel (Settings > Plugin > Generate Bootstrap Token). Token is used once on extension install to securely obtain webhook authentication credentials.

guiUrl.title: GUI URL
guiUrl.description: Base URL of Vigil Guard web interface. Default: http://localhost:80/ui

enabled.title: Protection Enabled
enabled.description: Enable or disable prompt protection. When disabled, all requests are allowed without filtering.
